About Wisp Creek Design

All the jewelry boxes on this site are handmade from solid hardwood lumber. I use Mahogany and Walnut currently. If you are interested in a box made with a different species of wood, just let me know. I plane and joint all the pieces down to size, and use only joinery and glue to fasten the parts. There are no mechanical fasteners of any kind used in the boxes.

I would like to dedicate this site and the woodworking dream to an old 'Mainer' friend whose woodworking passion was contagious, and whose simple pine bookshelf still stands in my daughter's bedroom. Thanks for reawakening an old passion, Cabot.
